original_text:
Golden Clover
La bellezza di un prato infinito, che spinge l’occhio proprio là dove nasce l’arcobaleno: è davanti a questo spettacolo fantastico che si anima la slot machine Golden Clover. Parliamo di una macchinetta in stile Irish, che permette al giocatore di sfidare la fortuna con l’immancabile trifoglio d’oro. Il provider Onlyplay ci ha voluto stupire ancora una volta, lanciando una slot dalle meccaniche particolari, che sembra ispirarsi a un grande classico dei computer. Hai mai giocato a Campo Minato? Ecco, possiamo dire che Golden Clover è la versione moderna di quel gioco storico. Solo che in questo caso dovrai destreggiarti tra Trifogli e Bombe da evitare per far aumentare il valore della tua vincita. Ti trovi di fronte a una griglia con meccaniche tipiche della cosiddetta lotteria a turni, che porta il giocatore a scegliere personalmente le caselle presenti sui rulli. Se scopri il Simbolo vincente continui a moltiplicare la tua vincita. Altrimenti riparti da zero!
Per capire come funziona la slot continua a leggere la nostra recensione ed entra nel vivo di questa slot 3×3 con un RTP al 96.2%.
La grafica della slot Golden Clover
La software house punta tutto su uno stile cartoon e rispolvera il tema Irish che è molto amato dagli appassionati di gambling. In questo caso ci si trova davanti a una piccola griglia di gioco dove si posizionano nove caselle coperte. Come sfondo troviamo un prato verde luminoso con un arcobaleno stupendo che regna sovrano. La colonna sonora che accompagna ogni tua scelta è una base dai suoni tipici irlandesi.
Il gameplay è molto intuitivo e poco animato: l’avventura inizia da subito, impostando il valore della scommessa. Scegli quanto puntare e mettiti alla ricerca dei Trifogli. Scegli la posizione del simbolo fortunato e per ogni casella a lui associata puoi moltiplicare la tua vincita. Attenzione per: se non riesci a trovare il Tifoglio, ma finisci per sbaglio sulla casella della Bomba perdi tutto. E ovviamente dovrai iniziare una nuova partita!
Come è facile intuire si tratta quindi si una slot molto semplice, che riesce a garantire delle vincite interessanti, ma non offre chissà quale colpo di scena particolare. Non ci sono Funzioni extra o bonus particolari: sei tu con la tua innata fortuna. Le vincite sono legate unicamente al tipo di scelta che compi sulla griglia in modo manuale e in prima persona.
Considerazioni finali su Golden Clover
Se ami la slot semplici, ma con un meccanismo nuovo e ben lontano dai classici rulli sei nel posto giusto. Golden Clover è piacevole e sicuramente non richiede particolari abilità e anni di esperienza al gioco per essere provata. Se ti senti ispirato puoi spingerti fino all’ultimo step e sperare di trovare tutti e 4 i Trifogli, evitando le 5 caselle che sono associate alla Bomba. Se riesci in questo intento puoi anche assicurarti una vittoria pari a 118x la tua puntata.
Il design non è particolarmente curato, ma è piacevole esattamente come il suo gameplay: se ami la semplicità e vuoi divertirti senza distrazioni o fronzoli questa è la realtà giusta per te.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Clover 

Step into the beauty of an endless green field where the rainbow reigns supreme in this fantastic slot game - Golden Clover. The Irish-style machine lets you challenge your luck with the all-time classic golden clover. The provider Onlyplay has yet again astounded us with a slot game that has unique mechanics and seems to be inspired by one of the greatest games of the computer era. Have you ever played Minesweeper? Well, Golden Clover is like a modern version of this historic game but with clovers and bombs that determine the value of your winnings. You face a grid with a typical lottery turn mechanism, which allows you to personally choose the squares on the reels. If you uncover a winning symbol, your winnings continue to increase. If not, you start from scratch!

To understand how this slot works, continue reading our review and delve into this 3x3 slot game with an RTP of 96.2%.

The Graphics of Golden Clover
The software house emphasizes a cartoon style and brings back the beloved Irish theme in gambling. You will find a small game field with nine covered squares against a bright green field with a stunning rainbow in the background. The soundtrack accompanies your every move, with typical Irish sounds. 

The gameplay is intuitive with minimal animation. Begin your adventure by setting the value of your bet. Choose how much to bet and start searching for the lucky clovers. Select the location of the lucky symbol and multiply your winnings for every square associated with it. But be careful! If you accidentally land on a bomb square, you lose everything and must start a new game!

As you can see, this slot game is simple, but it guarantees interesting winnings. It does not offer any extra functions or special bonuses. Your winnings solely depend on your manual choices on the grid.

Final Thoughts on Golden Clover
If you love simple yet unique slot games, Golden Clover is the right choice for you. It is enjoyable and does not require special skills or years of experience. You can even try to find all four clovers and avoid the five bomb squares for a chance to win 118x your bet. The design is not exceptionally elaborate, but it is just as pleasant as the gameplay. If you enjoy simplicity and want to have fun without distractions or frills, this slot game is perfect for you.

However, a major con of the game is that it has no extra functions or special bonuses, so players might find the game boring after playing it for a while. Additionally, players who love sophisticated design might not appreciate the cartoon-style graphics that Golden Clover offers.

Review:
 
Golden Clover online slot game

Golden Clover is a slot game by Onlyplay, featuring a 3x3 manual grid with typical lottery-style mechanics. Instead of the classic reels, players must maneuver between shamrocks and bombs to increase the value of their winnings.

Gameplay and features

As players select the position of the lucky symbol and for every cell associated with it, they can multiply their winnings. Losing on a bomb cell means starting a new game. The game doesn't offer extra functions or special bonuses.

Game developer and system requirements

Golden Clover is developed by Onlyplay and requires no download. The game is based on HTML5 technology and works on desktops, tablets, and smartphones on popular operating systems.

Irish theme and symbols

Golden Clover offers a playful and cartoon-style Irish theme, with a bright green meadow background dominated by a magnificent rainbow. The game features the classic symbols of shamrocks and a lucky clover, as well as simple graphics for the bombs, all accompanied by a traditional Irish tune.

RTP and winning potential

Golden Clover has an RTP of 96.2%. Though the game has no extraordinary surprises, interesting winnings are offered based on the players' choices on the manual grid. Players can even win up to 118x their bet by finding all four lucky clovers while avoiding the five bomb cells.

Review: Golden Clover:
Experience the infinite beauty of a lush green meadow, where your gaze is drawn to the birthplace of a rainbow. This is the breathtaking scene that comes alive in the Golden Clover slot game. With its Irish charm, this game invites you to challenge your luck with the timeless lucky charm - the golden clover. The provider, Onlyplay, has once again amazed us with an innovative slot machine that draws inspiration from classic computer games. Have you ever played Minesweeper? We can say that Golden Clover is the modern version of that iconic game. In this game, you must maneuver between shamrocks and bombs to increase the value of your winnings. You face a grid with typical lottery-style mechanics, allowing you to personally choose the cells on the reels. If you reveal a winning symbol, you multiply your winnings. Otherwise, start over from scratch!

To understand how this slot works, continue reading our review and dive into the fun of this 3x3 slot with an RTP of 96.2%.

Graphics of the Golden Clover slot:
The software house has gone all-in with a cartoon-style and the beloved Irish theme, which is popular among experienced gamblers. In this game, you face a small game grid with nine covered cells. The background features a bright green meadow dominated by a magnificent rainbow. The accompanying soundtrack is a traditional Irish tune.

The gameplay is very intuitive and not overly animated. The adventure begins immediately by setting the value of your bet. Choose your wager and hunt for the lucky clovers. Select the position of the lucky symbol and for every cell associated with it, you can multiply your winnings. Be careful, though. If you accidentally land on a bomb cell, you lose everything and start a new game!

As you may have guessed, this is a simple slot that offers interesting winnings, but no extraordinary surprises. There are no extra functions or special bonuses; it's just you and your innate luck. Your winnings are solely based on the choices you make on the manual grid.

Final thoughts on Golden Clover:
If you love simple slot games with a new mechanism, far from the typical reels, then Golden Clover is the perfect choice for you. This game is enjoyable and doesn't require special skills or years of gambling experience to try your luck. If you feel inspired, you can even go all the way and try to find all four lucky clovers while avoiding the five bomb cells. If you succeed, you can win up to 118x your bet!

The design may not be particularly sophisticated, but it's just as pleasing as the gameplay. If you love simplicity and want to have fun without distractions or frills, then Golden Clover is the right choice for you.
